definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters

sentences.english: Seal off the city from all outside contact to stop the spread of the plague.
sentences.chinese: 封城，隔绝此城与外界的接触，以避免瘟疫的扩散。

definition: to impose martial law/to impose emergency measures
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
to hunt and arrest (fugitives)/to track down and arrest/a manhunt
Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, surrounding Seoul and Incheon, capital Suweon City 水原市[Shui3 yuan2 shi4]
capital city and its surrounding area
to be attacked by an assassin
Yanjing, an old name for Beijing/capital of Yan at different periods
semicircular defensive enclosure around city gates/crescent-shaped barbican
Lincheng county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
